輷字的基本解释

輷
hōng
许多车辆的声音：“车马之多，日夜行不绝，輷輷殷殷，若有三军之众。”

輷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hōng］
［《廣韻》呼宏切，平耕，曉。］
［《廣韻》呼迸切，去諍，曉。］
象声词。状车声、雷鸣及其他巨大的声音。

輷字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　輷； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1246第22
【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?呼宏切，音轟。車聲。【史記·蘇秦傳】輷輷殷殷。【王褒·洞簫賦】輘輷佚豫。【註】輘輷，大聲也。　【廣韻】同轟。一作訇。

輷字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
輷字的起名意思

暂无。

Embarrass
Basic explanation of words
Embarrass
hōng
The voice of many vehicles: "There are so many carriages and horses, day and night, awkward, if there are three armies."
Embarrass
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hōng］
["Guangyun" Hu Hongqie, flat farming, dawn. ]
["Guangyun" call and cut, go to criticize, Xiao. ]
Onomatopoeia. Car sounds, thunder and other loud sounds.
Embarrass
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　輷; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 1246 22
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Hu Hong cut, sound boom. The sound of cars. 【Historical Records·Su Qin Chuan】have awkwardly. 【Wang Bao·Dongxiao Fu】Hao Yu Yu. 【Note】Shoulder, loudly.　【Guangyun】Tong Boom. A fool.
